titleStmt.title: Christs love, and saints sacrifice Preached in a sermon at St. Pauls Crosse, on the 23. of August, 1635. By Iames Conyers, Mr. of Arts of Sydney-Sussex in Cambridge, and minister of Stratford-Bow, in Middlesex.
titleStmt.author: Conyers, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. P[urslow] for H. Seile, dwelling at the Tygers head in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Tygers head in St. Pauls Church-yard
